job_history.work_description: Consistently a top performing Personal Banker and Business Advocate in the district. Received a Star Credit Award. Recognized for achieving the highest number of partner referrals which includes mortgages, merchant services, payroll services and insurance products. Frequent recipient of customers recognition for providing exceptional customer service experience.

job_history.role_name: Relationship Banker, Small Business Specialist, Investment Representative
job_history.work_description: Built relationships with customers by providing them with products and services to meet their needs. Acquired, retained, deepened and managed relationships with customers. Generated growth in balances through sales, marketing, promotion and referral of products and services.

Engaged in sales and service activities in a traditional branch setting. Opened consumer and Business accounts, Loan applications, crossed-sells bank products and services, and resolved customer service issues.
Answered inbound calls pertaining to customers questions and concerns regarding their accounts. Serviced customers existing accounts. Recommended new products and services.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Over 10 years of experience in customer-facing roles, consistently receiving recognition for exceptional customer service, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in sales and marketing of financial products and services, with a proven track record of generating growth and achieving sales targets, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Relationship Building
skills.explanation: Consistently built and managed relationships with customers, demonstrating a strong ability to acquire, retain, and deepen relationships, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Products
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with a wide range of financial products, including mortgages, merchant services, payroll services, and insurance products, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effective communication skills demonstrated through ability to resolve customer service issues, recommend new products and services, and provide exceptional customer service, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Able to manage multiple responsibilities and tasks in a fast-paced environment, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Part of a team that achieved sales targets and generated growth, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in teamwork.
